text: Let's work together to eradicate cervical cancer! 🎬🧵💪Did you know that cervical cancer is a preventable disease? 🤔 The HPV vaccine and regular Pap tests can help detect and prevent it. 💉👍Follow the American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists' recommendations for cervical cancer screening: 📅* Ages 21-29: Pap test every 3 years. 💪Don't forget to take advantage of free breast and cervical cancer screening resources in Massachusetts! 🤝If you're diagnosed with cervical cancer, don't hesitate to follow up with an oncologist immediately. 🏥💕Let's spread awareness and take action against cervical cancer! 🌟🎉
